text: the second most senior intelligence
officer in Afghanistan died in this car
Wednesday dr. Abdullah Legman II was
visiting his home town of Mestalla two
hours east of Kabul when he was killed
by a suicide bomber outside the main
mosque in the holy month of Ramadan at
least sixteen were killed according to
hospital officials but as an
intelligence expert he knew a lot about
al-qaeda and he was a person who was
very active actively it's usually a
quiet town and the assassination of such
a senior security official highlights
how the Taliban can strike even where
people don't expect it he was a key aide
to President Hamid Karzai pictured here
with him far right now dr. Abdullah leg
manis picture on this poster at the bomb
scene is lacerated with the sharp nail
that killed him in addition to the dead
more than 50 were wounded and the town's
tiny morgue was overwhelmed Muslim
tradition says they must bury the dead
quickly
in this incident and 90% of people are
civilians only dr. Abdullah plus three
people are government officials others
are all civilians and this is a holy
month of Ramadan and this is a peace
month
